name: Ambient Icons
description: Syncs the color of your icons with the level.

change-extra.name: Change extra colors
change-extra.description: You can't have only wave trail enabled, it will be overriden by the glow color option.

render-x-pos.name: Set X
render-x-pos.description: Set where in the X axis pick the colors. <co>0.4 may conflict with player follow picker.</c>

render-y-pos.name: Set Y
render-y-pos.description:
Set where in the Y axis pick the colors
<co>Overriden by Y offset when player follow is enabled.</c>

player-follow-picker.name: Follow player
player-follow-picker.description:
The color picker follows the player
<co>Useful when the level has a custom BG, doesn't work with dual.</c>

player-follow-offset.name: Follow player Y offset
player-follow-offset.description:
Set where in the Y axis pick the colors related to the player position on Y
(player pos + offset).

update-time.name: Update time (ms)
update-time.description: <co>Increase the value if there are too many flashing colors or having fps drops.</c>

change-method-when-black.name: Change method on black
change-method-when-black.description: Change the pick color method (BG picker to non-follow screen picker) if the color picked in the BG is black (0,0,0).

change-to-follow-method-when-black.name: Change method to follow
change-to-follow-method-when-black.description:
Change the pick color method (BG picker to screen player follow picker) if the color picked in the BG is black (0,0,0).
<co>Overwrites above option</c>
